bike.description: Full high modulus carbon fiber, Dyad Elite lay-up, shaped-optimized top and down tubes, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, SST tubing diameters, PressFit30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, stainless steel chain stay protector, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Fox Float 29 CTD (3 position),15QR thru axle system, lever-actuated lockout, air spring pressure, rebound adjust, tapered alloy steerer, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
Shimano MT66 29", tubeless w/15mm thru axle front & centerlock hubs
Shimano XT Shadow rear and SLX 4.9mm top pull front
Ritchey Pro 2x bar, 31.8 x 9JAMIS_DEGREE sweep x +/- 5mm rise x 720mm
Ritchey Pro 2 bolt OS, 31.6 x 400mm, with alloy clamp and cromo seatpin
Shimano SLX M675 hydraulic disc brakes with 180mm front & 160mm rear RT67 centerlock rotors
